attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.text: Pineco does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Cold Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

cards.name: Mystery Plate Gamma
text: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, shuffle your hand into your deck and then draw 6 cards. If your opponent has exactly 2 Prizes, choose 1 of your opponent's Evolved Pokémon. Your opponent puts the top card on that Evolved Pokémon on the bottom of his or her deck. (This counts as devolving that Pokémon.)

ability.name: Crystal Type
ability.text: Whenever you attach a Grass, Fire, or Fighting basic Energy card from your hand to Golem, Golem's type (color) becomes the same as that type of energy until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Earth Bomb
attacks.text: Golem does 20 damage to itself. This attack also does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (yours and your opponents). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Energy Recharge
ability.text: When you play Arcanine from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a basic energy card from your discard pile and attach it to Arcanine.

attacks.name: Shake
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: White Flames
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Arcanine.

ability.name: Water Immunity
ability.text: You can't attach Water Energy cards from your hand to Articuno.

attacks.name: Freeze Solid
attacks.text: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Articuno.

attacks.name: Ice Cyclone
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Pokémon in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spinning Blow
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If both coins are heads, switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scatterbomb
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, do 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. For each tails, do 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Self Healing
ability.text: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Flareon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Flareon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Burn Booster
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack. If the discarded card is a Energy card, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

ability.name: Primal Aura
ability.text: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokémon, neither player can play Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Cut
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Immunity
ability.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks done to Machamp.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokémon, ignore this effect.

attacks.name: Hurricane Punch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Streaming Mantle
ability.text: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and then shuffle 3 basic energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent must do the same.

attacks.name: Crushing Lava
attacks.text: You may discard a or basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If you discard a Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Bounce Off
attacks.text: If Magneton and the Defending Pokémon don't have the same number of Energy cards attached to them, the player controlling the Active Pokémon with the fewest number of Energy cards attached to it switches 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magnetic Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon minus the number of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (For example, if your opponent has 1 Benched Pokémon and you have 3, this attack will do 30 damage plus 20 more damage.)

attacks.name: Freezing Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Trample
attacks.text: For each Benched Pokémon (yours and your opponent's), flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sudden Growth
attacks.text: Attach any number of basic Energy cards from your hand to Politoed.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Splash
attacks.text: Move 2 Energy cards attached to Politoed to 1 or 2 of your Benched Pokémon. (You may put both on the same Pokémon, or 1 each on 2 different Pokémon.) If you have no Benched Pokémon, ignore this effect.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy cards attached to Starmie and the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Star Back
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

ability.name: Synchronicity
ability.text: You may attach any Technical Machine to Xatu.

attacks.name: Warp Hole
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Charge
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack foes 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads. Put a damage counter on Piloswine for each heads.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Assist
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon card named Nidoran M or Nidoran F and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your bench is full.)

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

ability.name: Lolling About
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack) if Snorlax is your Active Pokémon, you may remove 1 damage counter from Snorlax. Snorlax is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Sound Waves
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Flitter
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

cards.name: Fisherman

ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack) you may flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't attach Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokémon during his or her next turn.

attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost. Damage is calculated using the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost after applying effects to the Retreat Cost.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

If the Pokémon using this attack has and basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage and removes 3 damage counters from the Pokémon that Miracle Sphere alpha is attached to.

cards.name: Mystery Zone
text: Once during each player's turn (before he or she attacks), if that player has an Evolution card in his or her hand, he or she may search his or her deck for a basic Energy card, show it to his or her opponent, and put it into his or her hand. Then that player chooses an Evolution card from his or her hand, shows it to his or her opponent, and puts it into his or her deck. That player shuffles his or her deck afterward.

cards.name: Underground Lake
text: Once during each player's turn, that player may put an Omanyte or Kabuto card from his or her discard pile onto his or her Bench. (Cards put on the Bench in this way are considered Basic Pokémon.)
